# pkcs11_token_info (Data Source)

Reads token information from the configured PKCS#11 slot.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Read token information from the configured slot
data "pkcs11_token_info" "current" {}

output "token_label" {
  value = data.pkcs11_token_info.current.label
}

output "token_model" {
  value = data.pkcs11_token_info.current.model
}
```

- `free_private_memory` (Number)
- `free_public_memory` (Number)
- `hardware_version` (String)
- `label` (String)
- `manufacturer_id` (String)
- `max_pin_len` (Number)
- `max_rw_session_count` (Number)
- `max_session_count` (Number)
- `min_pin_len` (Number)
- `model` (String)
- `rw_session_count` (Number)
- `serial_number` (String)
- `session_count` (Number)
- `total_private_memory` (Number)
- `total_public_memory` (Number)
